thread.title_full: Security Compass Finds ZENEDGE Cybersecurity Platform Impenetrable

author: Amanda Larrinaga
title: Security Compass Finds ZENEDGE Cybersecurity Platform Impenetrable
text:
ZENEDGE , a leader in Cloud-based cybersecurity solutions, today announced the company’s cybersecurity platform has successfully withstood the full-range of complex, multi-vector distributed denial of service (DDoS) “battle tests”, designed by Security Compass to simulate the most sophisticated real-world DDoS attacks. The comprehensive tests, designed by the DDoS Strike division of Security Compass , used advanced techniques to determine the effectiveness and responsiveness of the ZENEDGE DDoS mitigation capabilities under a variety of attack scenarios.
“Our tests clearly demonstrate that ZENEDGE offers robust and effective protection for businesses against the full range of volumetric and advanced application-layer DDoS attacks,” said Sahba Kazerooni, head of DDoS Strike and managing director of Security Compass. “Based on the stellar results, we feel very confident recommending ZENEDGE to organizations looking for best-in-class protection against DDoS attacks.”
The Security Compass DDoS Battle Test verified several aspects of ZENEDGE mitigation capabilities, including:
Bot detection and scrubbing for HTTP GET Floods
UDP blocking upstream
TCP SYN flood challenge
Bot detection and scrubbing for HTTP POST Floods
Automatic redirection of traffic to a scrubbing center when an attack is detected
“We are pleased to see further independent validation of our industry-leading DDoS mitigation capabilities,” said Yuri Frayman, CEO of ZENEDGE. “We will continue to push the boundaries of monitoring, automation and mitigation to provide our customers with the best protection.”
About ZENEDGE
ZENEDGE is a leading provider of Cloud-based cybersecurity solutions, specializing in Web Application Firewall (WAF) and DDoS mitigation for web applications, networks, and Domain Name Servers (DNS). ZENEDGE protects thousands of web properties and networks for customers in financial services, ecommerce, technology, media & entertainment, and government, with a global partner network in the United States, Canada, Europe, South America, and Asia. ZENEDGE is headquartered in Los Angeles, California. For more information, visit http://www.zenedge.com .
